text: The men's hammer throw at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games was held at National Stadium, Singapore. The track and field events took place on June 9. ==Schedule== All times are (UTC+08:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text- align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | Tuesday, 9 June 2015 || 09:30 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} == Records == The following new record were set during this competition. {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- !
